article_title: The Role Of Big Pharma In Neglected Diseases

article_metadata.description: The industry is a big target and, to be frank, not without its flaws. However, the industry does a lot of good beyond providing new treatments to treat the diseases of the world. It would be nice to remember that on occasion.
article_metadata.author: John LaMattina
